TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DrawingContext extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DrawingContext Inherits DispatcherObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class DrawingContext abstract : System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherObject, IDisposable

summary.span: 使用绘图、推送和弹出命令描述可视内容。

span.span: Describes visual content using draw, push, and pop commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来填充或可视化内容。Use a to populate a or a with visual content. 尽管绘图方法看上去相似的绘图方法类型，它们的功能却大相径庭：是与一个保留的模式图形系统一起使用，而类型用于即时模式图形系统。Although the draw methods appear similar to the draw methods of the type, they function very differently: is used with a retained mode graphics system, while the type is used with an immediate mode graphics system. 当你使用对象的绘图命令时，实际上存储一组呈现指令 (尽管具体的存储机制取决于提供的对象的类型)，将更高版本使用图形系统; 您都不绘制到实时屏幕。When you use a object's draw commands, you are actually storing a set of rendering instructions (although the exact storage mechanism depends on the type of object that supplies the ) that will later be used by the graphics system; you are not drawing to the screen in real-time. 有关 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 图形系统的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 图形呈现概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。For more information about how the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) graphics system works, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md). 你永远不会直接实例化; 但是，可以获取绘制上下文从某些方法，如和。You never directly instantiate a ; you can, however, acquire a drawing context from certain methods, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例检索从并使用它来绘制矩形。The following example retrieves a from a and uses it to draw a rectangle. [!code-csharp[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)] 下一个示例演示， ，和命令。The next example demonstrates the , , and commands. 从获取和显示使用控件。The is obtained from a and displayed using an control. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PushEffectExample.cs#pusheffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/pusheffectexample.vb#pusheffectexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Close ();

Public MustOverride Sub Close ()
public: abstract void Close();

summary.span: 关闭 并刷新内容。

span.span: Closes the and flushes the content.

summary.span: 此后，将不能修改 。

span.span: Afterward, the cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A必须先关闭然后可以呈现其内容，但它已关闭后，不能修改它。A must be closed before its content can be rendered, but after it has been closed, it cannot be modified. 此调用不需要具有弹出的所有推送调用。This call does not require all Push calls to have been Popped.

exception.span: 此对象已被关闭或释放。

span.span: This object has already been closed or disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract void DisposeCore ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisposeCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DisposeCore ()
protected: abstract void DisposeCore();

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿在代码中; 中直接调用此方法使用方法相反。Do not call this method directly from your code; use the method instead.

span.span: The object has already been closed or disposed.

span.span: The brush with which to fill the ellipse.

param.span: 此参数可选，而且可以为 。

span.span: This is optional, and can be .

param.span: 如果 brush 为 ，则不绘制任何填充。

span.span: If the brush is , no fill is drawn.

param.name: pen
param.span: 用于绘制椭圆笔画的笔。

span.span: The pen with which to stroke the ellipse.

param.span: 此参数可选，而且可以为 。

span.span: This is optional, and can be .

param.span: 如果 pen 为 ，则不绘制任何笔划。

span.span: If the pen is , no stroke is drawn.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和 绘制一个椭圆。

span.span: Draws an ellipse with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和钢笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果 brush 为`null`，则将不执行任何填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果 pen 为`null`，则不执行任何笔画。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果钢笔和画笔`null`，则绘制不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和钢笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果 brush 为`null`，则将不执行任何填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果 pen 为`null`，则不执行任何笔画。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果钢笔和画笔`null`，则绘制不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DrawRoundedRectangle(class System.Windows.Media.Brush brush, class System.Windows.Media.Pen pen, valuetype System.Windows.Rect rectangle, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock rectangleAnimations, float64 radiusX, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock radiusXAnimations, float64 radiusY, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock radiusYAnimations) cil managed

param.name: brush
param.span: 用于填充矩形的画笔；如果不填充，则为 。

span.span: The brush used to fill the rectangle, or for no fill.

param.name: pen
param.span: 用于绘制矩形笔画的笔；如果不绘制笔画，则为 。

span.span: The pen used to stroke the rectangle, or for no stroke.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 要绘制的矩形。

span.span: The rectangle to draw.

param.name: rectangleAnimations
param.span: 用于对矩形的大小和维数进行动画处理的时钟；如果没有动画，则为 。

span.span: The clock with which to animate the rectangle's size and dimensions, or for no animation.

param.span: 此时钟必须基于能够对 对象进行动画处理的 来创建。

span.span: This clock must be created from an that can animate objects.

param.name: radiusX
param.span: 圆角 X 维的半径。

span.span: The radius in the X dimension of the rounded corners.

param.span: 此值将被限制到 0 至 /2 的范围。

span.span: This value will be clamped to the range of 0 to /2

param.name: radiusXAnimations
param.span: 用于对矩形的 radiusX 值进行动画处理的时钟；如果没有动画，则为 。

span.span: The clock with which to animate the rectangle's radiusX value, or for no animation.

param.span: 此时钟必须基于能够对 值进行动画处理的 来创建。

span.span: This clock must be created from an that can animate values.

param.name: radiusY
param.span: 圆角 Y 维的半径。

span.span: The radius in the Y dimension of the rounded corners.

param.span: 此值将被限制到 0 至 /2 的范围。

span.span: This value will be clamped to a value between 0 to /2.

param.name: radiusYAnimations
param.span: 用于对矩形的 radiusY 值进行动画处理的时钟；如果没有动画，则为 。

span.span: The clock with which to animate the rectangle's radiusY value, or for no animation.

param.span: 此时钟必须基于能够对 值进行动画处理的 来创建。

span.span: This clock must be created from an that can animate values.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和 绘制一个圆角矩形并应用指定的动画时钟。

span.span: Draws a rounded rectangle with the specified and and applies the specified animation clocks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和钢笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果 brush 为`null`，则将不执行任何填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果 pen 为`null`，则不执行任何笔画。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果钢笔和画笔`null`，则绘制不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void DrawVideo (System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer player, System.Windows.Rect rectangle);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DrawVideo(class System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer player, valuetype System.Windows.Rect rectangle) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub DrawVideo (player As MediaPlayer, rectangle As Rect)
public: abstract void DrawVideo(System::Windows::Media::MediaPlayer ^ player, System::Windows::Rect rectangle);

param.name: player
param.span: 要绘制的媒体。

span.span: The media to draw.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 要在其中绘制 player 的区域。

span.span: The region in which to draw player.

summary.span: 将视频绘制到指定区域内。

span.span: Draws a video into the specified region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，媒体将拉伸以适合由矩形参数定义的区域。Note that the media will be stretched to fit inside the area defined by the rectangle parameter. 如果矩形和媒体具有不同的纵横比，将发生失真。If rectangle and media have different aspect ratios, distortion will occur. 更灵活地控制如何使用媒体以填充区域，使用命令要绘制一个矩形，其中填充，其中包含媒体。For more control over how media is used to fill an area, use the command to draw a rectangle and fill it with a that contains media.

permission.span: 若要显示不具有的媒体或访问。

span.span: to display media that you do not have or access for.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Pop ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Pop() cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Pop ()
public: abstract void Pop();

summary.span: 弹出推送到绘制上下文上的最后一个不透明蒙板、不透明度、剪辑、效果或转换操作。

span.span: Pops the last opacity mask, opacity, clip, effect, or transform operation that was pushed onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦运算将弹出，它不再适用于后续绘图命令。Once an operation is popped, it is no longer applied to subsequent drawing commands. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的效果命令。The following example shows the effect of the command. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PopExample.cs#popexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/popexample.vb#popexamplewholepage)] 下图显示了此示例的输出：The following illustration shows this example's output: ![使用不同不透明度值绘制的矩形](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "使用不同不透明度值绘制的矩形")![Rectangles drawn with different opacity values](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "Rectangles drawn with different opacity values")

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void PushClip (System.Windows.Media.Geometry clipGeometry);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PushClip(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry clipGeometry) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub PushClip (clipGeometry As Geometry)
public: abstract void PushClip(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ clipGeometry);

param.name: clipGeometry
param.span: 要应用于后续的绘图命令的剪辑区域。

span.span: The clip region to apply to subsequent drawing commands.

summary.span: 将指定的剪辑区域推送到绘图上下文上。

span.span: Pushes the specified clip region onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过删除之前的剪辑区域适用于所有后续的绘图命令命令。The clip region applies to all subsequent drawing commands until it is removed by the command.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("BitmapEffects are deprecated and no longer function. Consider using Effects where appropriate instead.")

span.span: The area to which the effect is applied, or if the effect is to be applied to the entire area of subsequent drawings.

summary.span: 将指定的 推送到绘图上下文上。

span.span: Pushes the specified onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 效果应用于所有后续的绘制操作，直到它被移除命令。The effect is applied to all subsequent drawing operations until it is removed by the command. ## Examples 下面的示例演示， ，和命令。The following example demonstrates the , , and commands. MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void PushOpacityMask (System.Windows.Media.Brush opacityMask);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PushOpacityMask(class System.Windows.Media.Brush opacityMask) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub PushOpacityMask (opacityMask As Brush)
public: abstract void PushOpacityMask(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ opacityMask);

param.name: opacityMask
param.span: 要应用于后续绘图的不透明蒙板。

span.span: The opacity mask to apply to subsequent drawings.

param.span: 此画笔的 Alpha 值决定了它要应用到的绘图的不透明度。

span.span: The alpha values of this brush determine the opacity of the drawing to which it is applied.

summary.span: 将指定的不透明蒙板推送到绘图上下文上。

span.span: Pushes the specified opacity mask onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过删除之前，该蒙板应用于所有后续的绘图命令操作。The mask is applied to all subsequent drawing commands until it is removed by the operation. 有关创建不透明蒙板的详细信息，请参阅[不透明度掩码概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about creating opacity masks, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).
